description: After a cheese toastie with a twist? Try this easy kimchi cheese toastie â€“ it's an unexpected flavour combo that works a treat!
keywords: Lunch,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Comfort food,Sandwich press,Quick & easy lunch
name: Kimchi and Cheese Toasties Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place bread on a chopping board. Spread half the mayonnaise over bread slices. Top 2 bread slices with half of each cheese, then kimchi, half the chives and remaining cheeses. Sandwich with remaining bread slices, mayonnaise-side down. Spread sandwich tops with half of the remaining mayonnaise. Turn sandwiches over and spread bread slices with remaining mayonnaise.
Place sandwiches in sandwich press and cook for 5 minutes or until cheese has melted and bread is golden brown and toasted. Serve toasties scattered with remaining chives and drizzled with honey.
